metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2400 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: External Control of File Name or Path in GitHub repository dompdf/dompdfprior to 2.0.0.

criterions.comment: php-dompdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
